snippet: Mr. Rowan and his wife, Betty, made a $100 million donation to Glassboro State College in New Jersey in 1992, which was then the biggest individual cash gift to any public college or university.
abstract: Henry M Rowan Jr, industrialist whose work led to global conglomerate Inductotherm Group, and who made biggest individual cash gift to public college or university in 1992 when he gave $100 million to Glassboro State College in New Jersey,  dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rowan and his wife, Betty, made a $100 million donation to Glassboro State College in New Jersey in 1992, which was then the biggest individual cash gift to any public college or university.

headline.main: Henry M. Rowan, Industrialist Who Gave $100 Million Gift to University, Dies at 92
headline.print_headline: Henry M. Rowan, Who Donated $100 Million, Dies at 92
